com.vmware.appliance.update

Interface Policy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PolicyTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolicyStub

    public interface Policy
extends Service, PolicyTypes
    The Policy interface provides methods to set/get background check for the new updates.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.appliance.update.PolicyTypes

        PolicyTypes.Config, PolicyTypes.DayOfWeek, PolicyTypes.Info, PolicyTypes.Time
